record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 1927 AND H.R. 2831

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for the second time en bloc.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
